mapper.delete: delete from MASTER_GROWTH_TBL g where g.gro_no in (select i.gro_no from MASTER_GRO_IMG_TBL i where g.gro_no = #{gro_no})
mapper.select: select g.* , i.gro_img from MASTER_GROWTH_TBL g left outer join MASTER_GRO_IMG_TBL i on g.gro_no = i.gro_no where g.baby_id = #{baby_id} AND i.gro_img is not null order by g.gro_no desc
